title: TUI refactor: Extract Completer trait
description: FileCompleter and CommandCompleter have identical active, query, selected fields and move_up/down, activate/deactivate methods. Extract shared Completer trait. Saves ~200 lines.

logs.msg: Sprint 14 design complete. CompleterState<T> will unify FileCompleter (388), CommandCompleter (272). ~160 lines saveable.
